'''Adhigama Wood "Versatile" Shelves''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Adhigama Wood "Versatile" Shelves is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.
